title: Business developer
description: Interactive mascot for websites. Load your database to AI chat and youser will be able to ask questions and get answers.

INITIAL_LIST_OF_PROJECTS.title: list of projects
INITIAL_LIST_OF_PROJECTS.description: List of projects to be founded in google search.
INITIAL_LIST_OF_PROJECTS.error_message: Please enter a valid list of projects.
help_image:
Enter a list of projects that you want to be founded in google search. For example:
project1
project2
project3'.

SEARCH_PROMT.title: Instruction for googling
help_image: Что мы должны найти в гугле по списку сайтов. Например найти официальный сайт проекта или найти в каких каталогах представлен продукт

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.title: Github Access Token
GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Github Access Token to store the chatbot's source code in your Github's profile (it's free).
GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.error_message: Please enter a valid Github Access Token.
help_image: Sign up for a GitHub account https://github.com if you don't already have one.
Open this page and select 'All repositories' https://github.com/settings/personal-access-tokens/new here.
In the premissions section select: Actions, Contents, Deployments, Envirements, Secrets, Variables, Workflows
Click 'Generate Token' and copy the token to your clipboard.

OPENAI_API_KEY.title: OpenAI API Key
OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for generating responses.
OPENAI_API_KEY.error_message: Please enter a valid OpenAI API key.
help_image: Sign up for a OpenAi account https://platform.openai.com if you don't already have one. Skip the onboarding process.
Open this page https://platform.openai.com/api-keys here. And create a new API key.
Copy the API key to your clipboard and paste it here.

deployment_confirmation: Are you ready to deploy your Mascot with these settings? (Yes/No)
completion_message: Your Mascot is now ready and operational!
